728430f-a.text:
Arthur Kill Road, north side (foreground, not seen), west of Kenilworth Avenue, showing a private driveway leading from Arthur Kill Road to the house about 325 yards away. This property belongs to St. Michaels Home (1907 to 1917 maps). It belonged to Jos. Perine in 1898 and to the estate of Maj. C. Britton in 1874. The dates refer to maps on which the owners' names appear.
January 31, 1931
P. L. Sperr
